name: @afw/react-monaco
description: Adaptive Framework Source Editor implemented with Monaco Code Editor.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf build/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production swc src -d build/cjs -s --config-file ../../../../.swcrc --copy-files
scripts.build:esm: rimraf build/esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=production swc -C module.type=es6 src -d build/esm -s --config-file ../../../../.swcrc --copy-files
